TextView.android:text: Have you noticed any changes in your local environment in the last few years?
If so, what changes have you observed? (Several answers possible)
Increase in extreme weather events (rain, drought, flooding)
How have these changes affected your daily life?
Have you been affected by the floods within the last year?
What are the losses caused by these floods?
Death of a member of your household
Were you affected by an unusually high heat in the last year?
What are the losses caused by this unusually high heat?
Death of a member of your household
Illness of a member of your household
What is the period of this disease?
What is the period of this disease?
Have you heard of climate change?
Where do you get your information on climate change from? (Several answers possible)
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate your knowledge of climate change?
Do you think climate change poses a serious threat to the planet?
How worried are you about climate change?
What aspects of climate change are you most concerned about? (Several answers possible)
Increase in extreme weather events (storms, floods)
Drying up of rivers and streams
Rising levels of rivers and streams
Do you think your community is doing enough to address climate change?
Have you changed your consumption habits to reduce your impact on the environment?
If so, what actions have you put in place? (Several answers possible)
Reduction of the use of plastics
Use of environmentally friendly means of transportation (bicycle, public transit)
Consumption of local and seasonal foods
Reduced energy consumption in the home
What is your perception of renewable energy source (e.g. Solar and wind)?
What obstacles do you face in adopting more ecological behaviors? (Several answers possible)
Lack of access to eco-friendly alternatives
Habits that are difficult to change
